mapper.sql: c_id, c_number, c_goods_id, c_num, c_price, c_user_id
mapper.select: select * from a_cart INNER JOIN a_goods ON a_cart.c_goods_id=a_goods.goods_id where a_cart.c_user_id=#{cUserId}
mapper.insert:
insert into a_cart
c_id,
c_number,
c_goods_id,
c_num,
c_price,
c_user_id,
#{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cGoodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{cUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update a_cart
c_number = #{cNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_goods_id = #{cGoodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_num = #{cNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_price = #{cPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
c_user_id = #{cUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update a_cart set c_number = #{cNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_goods_id = #{cGoodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_num = #{cNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_price = #{cPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, c_user_id = #{cUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
